text: George William Foster (born October 7, 1955) is an American businessman and politician. He is the U.S. Representative for , winning the seat in 2012. He was the U.S. Representative for from 2008 to 2011. He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Bill Foster official U.S. House site * Bill Foster for Congress * * ; Scientific * academic papers * IEEE â€“ G.
